name: CITY of PITTSBURGH, Department of Personnel and Civil Service Commission v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellant
name_abbreviation: City of Pittsburgh v. Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: CITY of PITTSBURGH, Department of Personnel and Civil Service Commission v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Diane Blancett-Maddock, Asst. Chief Counsel, Pa. Human Relations Corn’n, for appellant.
Mary K. Conturo, City Sol., Marianne S. Malloy, Asst. City Sol., for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
648 A.2d 326
CITY of PITTSBURGH, Department of Personnel and Civil Service Commission v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 19, 1994.
Decided Oct. 12, 1994.
Diane Blancett-Maddock, Asst. Chief Counsel, Pa. Human Relations Corn’n, for appellant.
Mary K. Conturo, City Sol., Marianne S. Malloy, Asst. City Sol., for appellees.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
